com.metaio.cloud.plugin.data
Class RemoteAssetsManager

java.lang.Object
  com.metaio.cloud.plugin.data.RemoteAssetsManager

public final class RemoteAssetsManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible for downloading and caching remote assets such as images, models and tracking data.

Constructor Summary
RemoteAssetsManager(int imageCacheSize)
          Constructor
 
Method Summary
 void autoClearCache(long timeThreshold)
          clear cache based on last modified time. if time difference between last modified time and current system time is more than given threshold (in hours), the file is deleted

autoClearCache

public void autoClearCache(long timeThreshold)
clear cache based on last modified time. if time difference between last modified time and current system time is more than given threshold (in hours), the file is deleted

Parameters:
timeThreshold - threshold in hours

saveHashMaps

public boolean saveHashMaps()
Save hash maps for all the cached files

Returns:
true on success, false on failure
See Also:
loadHashMaps()

getImage

public android.graphics.Bitmap getImage(java.lang.String url)
Get cached image for the given URL. If the bitmap does not exists in the cache, null is returned

Parameters:
url - URL of the image
Returns:
Bitmap object or null

downloadAsset

public boolean downloadAsset(android.os.AsyncTask<?,?,?> task,
                             java.lang.String url)
Download a remote asset, e.g. tracking data. This method should be called in background in AsyncTask

Parameters:
task - AsyncTask in which this method is called
url - URL of the remote asset
Returns:
true on success
See Also:
getAsset(java.lang.String)

getAsset

public java.lang.String getAsset(java.lang.String url)
Get cached asset for the given URL. If the asset does not exists in the cache, null is returned

Parameters:
url - URL of the asset
Returns:
Fully qualified path of locally cached file
See Also:
downloadAsset(android.os.AsyncTask, java.lang.String)

downloadImage

public boolean downloadImage(android.os.AsyncTask<?,?,?> task,
                             java.lang.String url,
                             java.lang.String params)
Download and cache a remote image. The image is cached in memory, i.e. mImages

Parameters:
task - AsyncTask in which this method is executed
url - URL of the remote image
params - Additional parameters to concat to the URL, can be null
Returns:
true on success, false on failure
